name:
Instruments Of
Their Own Ruin
effect:
Add 1 {strife}{spacer_tiny}.
Each Invader with {strife} deals Damage to other Invaders in target land.

threshold.effectText: Instead, if Invaders Ravage in target land, they Damage Invaders in adjacent lands instead of {dahan} and the land. {dahan} in target land do not fight back.
